          <title>
            <string language="en">A relay circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Relaisschaltung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un circuit de relais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um circuito de relé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un circuito di relè</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κύκλωμα ηλεκτρονόμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un circuito de relais</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This circuit digram shows that light switches on when the pressure switch is on. This is an example of a relay circuit.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">relays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Stromkreis digram zeigt daß helle 
Schalter an, wenn der Druckschalter eingeschaltet ist. Dieses 
ist ein Beispiel einer Relaisschaltung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce digram de circuit prouve que les commutateurs 
légers en fonction quand le mano-contact est allumé. C'est un 
exemple d'un circuit de relais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este digram do circuito mostra que interruptores 
claros sobre quando o interruptor de pressão é sobre. Este é 
um exemplo de um circuito de relé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo digram del circuito indica che 
interruttori chiari sopra quando il pressostato è sopra. Ciò 
è un esempio di un circuito di relè.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το κύκλωμα digram δείχνει ότι το φως ανάβει 
πότε ο διακόπτης πίεσης είναι ανοικτός. Αυτό είναι ένα 
παράδειγμα ενός κυκλώματος ηλεκτρονόμων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este digram del circuito muestra que los 
interruptores ligeros encendido cuando el interruptor de presión 
está encendido. Éste es un ejemplo de un circuito de relais.</string>
          </description>
